Name: Name Change, Anthony Mosomillo Memorial Ballfields, Bklyn
Title: A Local Law in relation to a ballfield name, Anthony Mosomillo Memorial Ballfields, Borough of Brooklyn.
BodyName: Parks, Recreation, Cultural Affairs, and International Intergroup Relations

History.BodyName: Parks, Recreation, Cultural Affairs, and International Intergroup Relations
Parks, Recreation, Cultural Affairs, and International Intergroup Relations

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:


      Section 1.  The following ballfield name is hereby designated as hereafter indicated.

_________________________________________________________________
      New name				Present name		Limits
_________________________________________________________________
Anthony Mosomillo  			Bay Eighth Street	existing limits 
Memorial Ballfields			Ballfields		of Bay Eighth                  										Street Ballfields 
located at Bay Eighth Street and Cropsey Avenue


__________________________________________________________________

      ï¿½2.  This local law shall take effect immediately.



FN/aj
LS# 644 
11/19/98
11:03AM
Blessed Edmund Rice
